post.body: Saw a mother taking her daughter to school like that once, but in a car and then walked to school gates!
'Christmas is the one time of year when people of all religions come together to worship Jesus Christ' Bart Simpson
Good morning, hope you are well!
Is that where you work?

sings *it's so confusing these days* (David Bowie)

Thanks for your help, hope you're enjoying the world of Twitter!

Thanks for your help with Twitter apps. Is the ability to have multiple columns what clinches it for you in favour of TD?
*note* even!

"Is there anybody in there? Just nod if you can hear me! Is there anyone at home?"

What a awful thought!
Small discount and free delivery, but I had to haggle! ;-)

Thanks, really appreciated!

awesome!

thanks

I certainly will! LOL

Yes, we're *friends*

Looking at them now! :-)
Not an issue where we are, but maybe elsewhere
2009 will probably be worse for a lot of people, all of us in fact!
Yes, there is more demand on our community services. We will be making 150 hampers tomorrow compared with 120 last year.
Sorry I spoke! ;-)
Sorry to hear that, but there's a lot of unsettledness and uncertainty around at the moment in society
That's really good to hear!
I can imagine! Brrrrr!
Thanks, I'll pass it on!
:-0 It's a leaf! lol
It was blatant in the last 2 Bond movies!
Yeah, thanks! As long as they're not mixed or mangled! I'll check the post out later!
Doing OK thanks, hope you are as well!
Looking forward to your post about Brian McLaren
Hi!
Thanks, I'll check that out!
That's great, I'm just getting into it as well!
It's good to link up!
Thanks! :-)
Hi, and thanks for following, John.
That's great, I've been reading up about him and can see why it was inspirational.
Oh sorry! Shhhhh! lol

Oh dear, hope you find him soon. Perhaps he'll leave a *clue* ;-)
It's dark here now! :-(
Have you found him?
It's not called Basil by any chance? ;-)
Hope you have a great Saturday. Thanks for your help.
I want ease of email (Gmail) & browsing, and apps like Evernote, Twitter, TwitPic, etc etc.

I'll do that, thanks for all your help, appreciated! :-)
Can I use apps like Evernote and Twitter with Blackberry? Take photo, send to Evernote, TwitPic etc?
If I could get iPhone with Orange it would be a no brainer! But I should be able to haggle for good deal with Orange!
Yeah, thought of Blackberry. Want ease of emails, browsing, and apps for Evernote, Twitter etc.
Well done, perhaps something more gentle next?
Thanks for the link!
Shhhhhhhh! LOL
Yeah, I nearly threw something at it today when people kept turning it on! LOL
Goodnight Judy!
Looks more like Halloween! LOL
rotfl!
Awwww!
That is truly scary!
Thanks, it's working fine! They just take a bit of setting up!
Afraid so! But I nearly threw something at it this morning! LOL
Pleeeeeeeease!
The PCs redundant now, got a shiny new one! :-)
Don't worry. I'm normal! LOL
It's a 30 year old girl who died of a brain tumour, but it's a celebration of a wonderful life!
I'm a Christian pastor (officer) in The Salvation Army.

Interesting! Thanks!
It's back again!
He might have to!
Yeah, thanks! Hope you are well and have had a good time!

is about to have his first Christmas dinner! (mmm)
says good morning on a cold and frosty Wednesday! :-)
thinks it's time to say goodnight all! (bye)
shares http://hellotxt.com/l/ckPj (Reindeer Santa!) :-)
is doing some admin in the office and listening to Radcliffe and Maconie on BBC Radio 2 (music)
is off to Leicester!
says goodnight all! (bye)
shares http://hellotxt.com/l/74Fd (heavy snow in Gainsborough!) :-)
has been listening to *The Wall* during his travels today - classic rock with a perfect use of the double negative! (music)
I'm at Gainsborough, Lincolnshire (Gainsborough, West Lindsey, GB) - http://bkite.com/02MDR
OK, so Ward E12 is in West Wing! Logical?
I'm at Nottingham (Nottingham, Nottingham, GB) - http://bkite.com/02Mru
is visiting in Nottingham this evening!
Thanks to everyone who helped with advice and info about Twhirl and TweetDeck! :-)
is going to spend over Â£1,400.00 at a local supermarket!
asks if anyone has Christmas quotes or stories (clean please!) for a Civic Carol Service in Retford, as I have to stand in at last minute!
has arrived home after a great time carolling! :-)
is going out carolling with the band!
says it's a sunny morning in Gainsborough - good morning all! :-)
says that's all folks - see you in the morning! (bye)
shares http://hellotxt.com/l/3nr7 (my day off!) :-)
shares http://hellotxt.com/l/STRk Why not play my short tracks playlist at www.last.fm? :-)
says goodnight from Gainsborough in the UK! (bye)
thinks t'interweb has gone quiet! :-(
shares http://hellotxt.com/l/EAjZ (my day so far...) :-)
is home after a busy day - some odd jobs to do and Marta is taking Sarah to Newark to catch the train back to Leicester! :-)
says good (frosty) morning! Toy Service in Gainsborough and Civic Carol Service in Retford today! :-)
says it's time to go to bed! (bye)
shares http://tinyurl.com/6grttc carolling in Lincoln! :-)
http://twitpic.com/qrgb - Sarah has put up the Christmas tree and decorated it for us!
http://twitpic.com/qrbf - No expense spared in the Ager household to celebrate Christmas! Yo ho ho!

I'm at Lincoln, Lincolnshire (Lincoln, GB) - http://bkite.com/02Szw
They just turned and went across the setting sun! Awesome!
The Red Arrows just flew over my car at low level! Woot!
wonders what it would be like without hypothetical questions? (thinking)
http://twitpic.com/rdzv - Some seasonal food parcels waiting to go out!
is at the hall and the Christmas parcels are starting to go out! Good morning all! :-)
is going to say goodnight - goodnight! (bye)

http://twitpic.com/rv6m - One of about 70 presents ready to go out!
http://twitpic.com/rv5p - About 70 presents of toiletries being prepared to go to nursing homes and a hospital with the band on Sunday!
says good morning all wherever you are! :-)
is going to bed, goodnight all! (bye)
is taking the dog for a walk - well not literally, but when I've finished typing this! ;-)
The BBC were going to market the Salvation Army CD until the band saw the proposed cover http://www.plurkpix.com/pix/bbT.png
http://twitpic.com/sied - Sarah is now home for Christmas and is cooking our dinner! Fish pie! Mmmm!
says good morning from a very wet Gainsborough!
thinks it's time for bed - goodnight all! (bye)
shares http://hellotxt.com/l/qQt4 (this week!) :-)
is having a bad day as everything is going wrong! :-(
says good morning all! :-)
has downloaded Jeff Buckley's cover of *Hallelujah* to help it on it's way to Christmas Number 1 2008 in the UK! :-)

says good morning to you all! :-)
says goodnight all! My daily post http://hellotxt.com/l/hozz (bye)

is enjoying a mug of Chilli Hot Chocolate! Mmmm!

asks if any of you peeps would like to link up in any of these places: http://hellotxt.com/l/4Feh :-)
